alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 02 at 5:51PM AKST until March 06 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility to near zero at times. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
